ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — Statement of the economic operator that at no effective verdict has been issued against the economic operator.
Within the past 5 years for participation in a criminal organisation, corruption, fraud or money laundering;
— confirmation stating that no bankruptcy procedure has been initiated by a competent body,
— confirmation stating that no liquidation procedure has been initiated by a competent body,
— certificate of paid taxes, benefits and other public duties issued by a competent body in the country where the.
Economic operator is registered;
— confirmation from the Register of penalties for committed criminal offences of legal entities proving that no.
Secondary penalty — ban on participating in open call procedures, awarding public procurement contracts and.
Contracts on public-private partnership has been pronounced;
— confirmation from the Register of penalties for committed criminal offences of legal entities proving that no.
Secondary penalty — temporary or permanent ban on performing particular activity has been pronounced;
— confirmation stating that no misdemeanour sanction — ban on the performance of the profession, activity.
Or duty, i.e. temporary ban on the performance of a particular activity has been pronounced with an effective.
Verdict.
— In order to determine the legal requirement - declaration of independent bid to be signed by the authorized.
Person and it will be verified if the bid is digitally signed by the authorized person. The bidder should also.
Provide Current state issued by the Central Registry of the Republic Macedonia. In order to demonstrate the.
Ability on profession performance which applies to the contract.
— License for performing free transport of passengers in internal road transport in accordance with the Law of Road Transport,
— License for performing International free transport of passengers in international road transport in accordance with the Law of Road Transport.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — Licenses for each vehicle, License for performing free transport of passengers in internal road transport in accordance with the Law of Road Transport and License for Performing International free passenger transport in international road transport in accordance with the Law of Road Transport - Statement that the transport of passengers will be carried out exclusively with proper air conditioned motor vehicle’s - Statement that the transport of passengers will be carried out exclusively with the vehicles in accordance with the submitted traffic permits - Statement of the bidder for consent that if there is a change in the price of liquid fuels in the amount more or less than 5 % in accordance with the legal changes by the Energy Regulatory Commission will be carried out accordingly percentage increase or decrease in the agreed price - List of types of vehicles with proof copy of the valid driving license - Employees’ driving licenses - Statement of own service with proof or to submit a lease agreement or a maintenance contract with other firm certified - List of drivers with proof copy of driving licenses and Form M-1 and M-2, this also applies to a subcontractor - Notification of the elements of the contract which the economic operator intends to give to a subcontractor

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: In order to qualify as capable of carrying out the relevant public procurement contract from an aspect of its technical or professional capabilities, the economic operator has to fulfill the following minumum conditions: - The Bidder shall have at his disposal at any time at least 1 (one) bus with number of seats - minimum 50 and not older than 2004 for Free transport of passengers in internal road transport and at least 1 (one) bus with number of seats - minimum 50 and not older from 2004 for Free Transport of passengers in international road transport -At least 1 (one) van with number of seats - minimum 20 and not older than 2010 for Free transport of passengers in internal road transport and international road transport, These requirements are in accordance with the needs of the University "Goce Delchev" Stip -, the given parts-relations and are not separate line transport but for free transport according to the needs of the contracting authority (for example, on a certain relation, can be traveled once a month or once a year, depending on the needs which are not known in advance). The foregoing refers also to the subcontractors - To have extracts from appropriate licenses for free transport in the country and abroad (this also applies to the contractor and subcontractor) - Submit a Statement that the transport of passengers will be performed exclusively with air conditioned motor vehicle’s - Submit a Statement that the transport of passengers will be performed exclusively with vehicles in accordance with the submitted traffic permits - Submit a Statement of the tenderer agreeing that if there is a change in the price of liquid fuels in the amount more or less than 5 % in accordance with the legal changes made by the Energy Regulatory Commission an appropriate increase or decrease in the agreed price will be made - Submit a Statement of Own Service with proof or lease agreement or a maintenance contract with other firm certified - Submit a list of the types of vehicles with proof copy of the valid driver's license - Submit a list of drivers with proof copy of driving licenses and Form M-1 and M-2

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: More information can be found in the tender documentation, which is explained in details

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: The statement may not be delivered after the due date for receipt of requests pursuant to article 129 paragraph 1 of the Law on Public Procurement. The independent bid statement may not be signed by any other person other than the authorized person. The independent bid statement should be electronically signed by attaching a valid digital certificate of the authorised person. If the form is signed by a person authorized to digitally sign documents, then it should be personally signed by the authorised person, scanned and on that for the digital signature should be applied. Each offer signed contrary to point 4.7 of the tendering documentation will be discarded as an unacceptable offer.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: More information can be found in the tender documentation, which is explained in details
